THIN1934.title: The Thin Man
THIN1934.description: Former detective Nick Charles and his wealthy wife Nora investigate a murder case, mostly for the fun of it. Stars William Powell and Myrna Loy.

SOKO19.title: Metron, the Mysterious Space Man
SOKO19.description: The mysterious space man Metron lands in his flying saucer and befriends the Unicorn crew. And yet, it should come as no surprise that he's actually working for Gargoyle. Torozon makes an encore appearance, but Giant Robot literally tears him apart.

LISP09.title: The Oasis
LISP09.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 09 The Oasis.m4v
LISP09.description: Smith eats some fruit that turns him into a paranoid giant.

LISP10.title: The Sky Is Falling
LISP10.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 10 The Sky is Falling.mp4
LISP10.description: A small, crab-like robot heralds the arrival of a family of colonists from an alien race called the Taurons. John believes that they are peaceful settlers, but Smith insists that they are the vanguard of an invading army.

LITB091.title: June's Birthday
LITB091.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 091 June's Birthday.m4v
LITB091.description: Not wanting to hurt Beaver's feelings when he gives her a tacky blouse for her birthday, loving mother June promises Beaver that she will wear the blouse to a mother's club tea. But June wears another outfit instead, unaware that Beaver's grammar school class will also be at the tea to sing a special song.

SPRA37.title: Crash in the Jungle (part 2)
SPRA37.path: ../Speed Racer/Speed Racer - 37 Crash In The Jungle (part 2).mp4
SPRA37.description: Speed, Trixie, Sprytle and Chim-Chim are captured by a ruthless dictator's jungle army who plans to take over the world.

BSG120.title: Take the Celestra
BSG120.path: ../Battlestar Galactica TOS/Battlestar Galactica 21 - Take the Celestra.m4v
BSG120.description: During a celebration honoring Commander Kronus, Starbuck recognizes an old flame of his, Aurora and breaks off a date with Cassiopeia to follow his lost love to the Celestra. On their arrival, Starbuck and Apollo find themselves in the midst of a mutiny.

POIR07.title: Problem at Sea
POIR07.description: Poirot's Mediterranean cruise is disrupted when an unlikeable passenger is found murdered in her stateroom.

CSMS09.title: The Lives of the Stars
CSMS09.description: Carl Sagan examines the life cycle of stars from their creation to their deaths.

LITB092.title: Tire Trouble
LITB092.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 092 Tire Trouble.m4v
LITB092.description: Ward learns the power of his hastily spoken words when his boys' best efforts to quickly clean the garage result in a flat tire on the family car.

LISP08.title: Invaders From the Fifth Dimension
LISP08.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 08 Invaders From the Fifth Dimension.m4v
LISP08.description: Macabre aliens — quite literally talking heads — need a humanoid brain to replace a worn out computer in their spaceship. They capture Smith, but quickly realize that his brain is unsatisfactory. The aliens release Smith so that he can bring them somebody more suitable: a small Robinson.

ULTR38.title: Spaceship Rescue Command
ULTR38.description: Members of a space station are blinded by a mysterious force on another planet. The Science Patrol is called in to investigate.

LITB093.title: Larry Hides Out
LITB093.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 093 Larry Hides Out.m4v
LITB093.description: Larry hides in Wally and Beaver's bathroom after his mother embarrasses him in front of Beaver.

STAN19.title: The Practical Joker
STAN19.path: ../Star Trek Animated Series/Star Trek Animated Series - 19 The Practical Joker.m4v
STAN19.description: The computer of the Enterprise gains partial sentience and a taste for playing practical jokes on the crew.

LITB094.title: Pet Fair
LITB094.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 094 Pet Fair.m4v
LITB094.description: To impress his teacher and friends, Beaver fabricates owning a pet parrot to bring to the school pet fair but finds out that he can't afford to buy one when he goes to the pet store to make good on his claim.

GODZ09.title: All Monsters Attack
GODZ09.path: ../Kaiju (Giant Monsters)/All Monsters Attack (Godzilla's Revenge, Godzilla #10, 1969, dubbed).mp4

ULTR37.title: A Little Hero
ULTR37.description: The small monster Pygmon returns with a warning that a monster who can control other monsters is preparing an all-out attack against Earth.

BYOL1946.title: The Best Years of Our Lives

LISP11.title: Wish Upon A Star
LISP11.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 11 Wish Upon a Star.m4v
LISP11.description: Will and Dr. Smith come upon an alien machine that grants wishes, which tests the values of the Robinson group.

LITB095.title: Wally's Test
LITB095.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 095 Wally's Test.m4v
LITB095.description: When their plans to cheat on the history exam are foiled, sneaks Eddie Haskell and Lumpy Rutherford try to make it look like high-scoring Wally was the real cheater.

SPRA38.title: The Secret Invaders (part 1)
SPRA38.description: The Mach 5 team come across yet another band of assassins seeking to take over the kingdoms of Ambrocia and Abalonia.
